member.name: T:OpenActive.FakeDatabase.NET.FakeBookingSystem
member.summary: This class models the database schema within an actual booking system. It is designed to simulate the database that woFuld be available in a full implementation.

members.member: Note string type is used for the OrderId instead of Guid type to allow for correct ordering of GUIDs for the RPDE feed
